title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.127 - Apportionment date
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.127 - Apportionment date

State Regulations

The regulating district shall by resolution determine the
apportionment date. The value, condition and ownership of parcels of real
estate benefitted by the operation of the reservoir shall be determined as of
the apportionment date. Unless directed to modify the apportionment by the
department, the regulating district may not unilaterally modify the
apportionment until after the conclusion of the apportionment grievance
hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
606.127

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
